div.head: Red gum
div.ab: Take red wax, vermillion, & a small amount of resins resin pitch, as above.

div.head: Bronze of copper
div.ab: Take da some verdet & clear glue, & grind it together. Then make a layer on your wood, and take pin filings, and grind it on marble with water, then pour it on the wood & polish it with copper.

div.head: Bronze like tin
div.ab: Take looking-glass tin, two ounces of quicksilver, & melt the looking-glass tin into a new pot. And difiant as soon as it is all melted, put in the quickt aiant silver, & remove it from the fire, & let the said glue dry. Then take a piece of tin & burnish it on marble with clear water, and then coat it on the wood, and polish it with a piece of tin.

div.head: For making aquafortis
div.ab: Take a half-septier of vinegar with one ounce of verdigris, & one ounce of copperas & one ounce of solle, then put them together in a glass vial.
Take fine gold & put it on a quite clean bu marble & put aquafortis & start crushing. Then take saltpeter & sal ammoniac, and put it into a shell which should be large & washed, for safekeeping.
